title: SOLD - EPDG Back T-206 SGC & PSA
author: RayBShotz

posts.post_title: SOLD - EPDG Back T-206 SGC & PSA
posts.post_content:
A few really nice "tougher" EPDG's for sale.
Backs are clean and bright.

Kaiser Wilhelm With Bat Brooklyn SGC30 EPDG SOLD
Presents much nicer; has horizontal wrinkle cap heighth barely visible
Color and image clarity and centering are "lights out" gorgeous.
Could easily be a 60 without the wrinkle.
One of my favorite T-206 images.

Johnny Kling Portrait Cubs SGC40 EPDG SOLD
Deep rich ruby red backround, outstanding image and centering. Very small corner crease upper right. Crystal image clarity makes image depth look almost 3-D!

Chief Meyers Fielding NY Natl. SGC 40 EPDG SOLD
Nice emerald green backround and clear concise image. Light horizontal crease upper center left. Tough EPDG Fielding pose.

John Titus Portrait Philadelphia Ntl. SGC30 EPDG SOLD
Only mustachioed ballplayer in the T-206 set, Titus cards are in high demand and demand a premium as such. The EPDG is next to impossible to find!
Beatifully centered example has one light horizontal crease across the Titus shoulder line which doesn't detract from the sterling quality of this image.

Ray Demmitt NY Americans PSA4 EPDG SOLD
Centered example with no creasing this solid PSA 4 is in demand as an EPDG Back. Nice coloration and strong image.
 
My scanner is old. These cards are much brighter in person!!
 
Check or Money Order only please.
First I'll take it on these..
RayB

hi ray
i'll take the demmitt
drew

Weekend Blowout Sale.

I'll do $100 on Wilhelm or Kling.
$110 on Titus. Slashed to $85 !!
First I'll take it !!
RayB

First taker.
